DataElement.preferredName: Health Care Provider National Provider Identifier Number Code
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A unique identification number for health care services, supplies, and equipment providers in the United States. NPI is assigned for use in all administrative and financial transactions specified by HIPAA. NPI is issued by the National Plan and Provider Enumeration System (NPPES) and is 10-position, all-numeric identification number with no embedded intelligence.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Health Care Provider National Provider Identifier
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Persons who provides health care as part of their job responsibilities: or a person or organization who is licensed to supply health care.:A unique identification number for health care services, supplies, and equipment providers in the United States.  NPI is assigned for use in all administrative and financial transactions specified by HIPAA. NPI is issued by the National Plan and Provider Enumeration System (NPPES) and is 10-position, all-numeric identification number with no embedded intelligence.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Persons who provides health care as part of their job responsibilities, or a person or organization who is licensed to supply health care.

Concepts.definition: Persons who provides health care as part of their job responsibilities: or a person or organization who is licensed to supply health care.

Property.preferredDefinition: A system for uniquely identifying all providers of health care services, supplies, and equipment. NPIs are assigned by the National Plan and Provider Enumeration System (NPPES) and are 10-position, all-numeric identification numbers that will identify a health care provider in standard transactions, such as health care claims.

Concepts.definition: A unique identification number for health care services, supplies, and equipment providers in the United States.  NPI is assigned for use in all administrative and financial transactions specified by HIPAA. NPI is issued by the National Plan and Provider Enumeration System (NPPES) and is 10-position, all-numeric identification number with no embedded intelligence.
